name: Alex Johnson
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Passionate full-stack developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading technical teams. Specialized in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud architecture, and developer experience optimization.

achievements: Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization and caching strategies
Led migration to microservices architecture, reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored 5 junior developers and established code review best practices

achievements: Developed REST API serving 100K+ requests per day
Implemented real-time features using WebSocket technology
Reduced bug reports by 50% through comprehensive testing strategy
